titleStmt.title: Mahurjhari Charter of Pr̥thivīṣeṇa II, Year 17

licence.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit thttps://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xmlfile.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
dr̥ṣṭaM . svasti pr̥th ivisamudrāT . Agniṣṭomāptoryyāmo
kthya-ṣoḍaśy-atirātra-vājapeya-br̥haspati-sava-sādyaskra-
catur-aśva- medha-yājinaḥ viṣṇuvr̥ddha-sagotrasya sa
mrāḍ vākāṭakānāṁ mahārāja-śrī-pravarasenasya sūno ḥ sūno
r atyanta-svāmi-ma
hā-bhairava-bhaktasya Aṁsa-bhāra-saṁnive
śita-śiva-liṅgo
dvahana-śiva-suparituṣṭa-samutpādita
-rāja-va ṅśānām parākkramādhigata-bhāg īratthy-
ā a mala-jala-mūrddhābhi
ṣiktānā n daśāśvamedhāvabhr̥tha-snātānāṁ bhāraśivānāṁ mahārāja-
śrī-bhavanāga-dauhitrasya gautamī-putrasya putrasya vākā
ṭakānāṁ ma hārāja-śrī-rudrasenasya sūnoḥ Atyanta-
māheśvarasya saty
a ā rjjava-kā ruṇya-śauryya-vik krama-naya-vinaya-
māhātmya-dhīma tva-pātra-gata-bhaktitva-dharmma-vijayitva-mano-nai
rmmalyādi-guṇa-samuditasya va rṣa-śatam abh ivarddhamāna-kośa-da
ṇḍa-sādhana-santāna-putra-pautriṇaḥ yudhiṣṭhira-vr̥tter vākāṭakā
nāṁ mahārāja-śrī-pr̥thiv īṣeṇasya sūnor bbhagavataś cakkrapāṇ
ai e ḥ
prasā do pā rjji ta-śr ī-samud
i a yasya vākāṭakānā ṁ mahārā
ja-śrī-rudrasenasya sūnoḥ pūrvva-rājānuvr̥tta-mārggānusāriṇaḥ
sunaya-bala-parākkramocchinna-sarvva-dviṣa ḥ mahārājādhirāja-śrī-
devagupta-sutāyā ṁ prabhāvat iguptāyām utpannasya vākā
ṭaka-vaṁ śālaṅkāra-bhūtasya śambhoḥ prasāda-dhr̥t
i a -kārtta-yugasya
mahārāja- śrī-pravarasenasya sūnoḥ pūrvvādhigata-gu
ṇa-va d- dāyā dā pahr̥ta-vaṁśa-śriya ḥ kosal ā-mekal ā-māla
vādhipa ti bhir abhyarccita-śāsa nasya pratāpa-praṇatār
ā i - śāsanasya
vākāṭakānā ṁ mahārāja-śr
i ī -narendrasenasya sūnoḥ kuntalādhi pati
-sutāyāṁ mahādevyām ajjhitabha ṭṭārikāyām utpannasya Atyan
n t a-bhā ga
vatasya tejaḥ-kṣamā-sannidhāna- bhūtasya magna-va ṅśod dha rttu r vvākāṭakānāṁ
mahārāja-śrī-pr̥thivīṣeṇasya vacanāT

Aramb
ī i rājye| jamala
kheṭaka-mār gge Asmat-santakās sarvvāddhyakṣa-niyoga-niyuktā Ā
jñā-sañcāri- kula-putrādhikr̥tā bhaṭā
c ś chātrāś ca viśruta
-pūrvvayājñayājñāpayitavyāḥ . vidi tam astu vaḥ yathāsmābhi
r ātmano dharmmāyur-bbalaiśvaryya-vivr̥ddhaye ihā mutra-hi tārt tha ṁ vaijayike
dharmma-sthāne somadaryyāḥ Apareṇa| nānd īpu rakasya pūrvveṇa . Ubbhī
lakasya dakṣiṇena| jalakukkubhakasya Uttareṇa| jamalakheṭa
kaṁ nāma grāmaḥ pr̥thivīpura-v astavyo vājasaneyi-kāśyapa-sa
gotro viṣṇu datta-bhavadattābhyām apūrvva-da tyā Udaka
-pūrvvam atisr̥ṣṭaḥ

Ucitāṁś cāsya pūrvva-rājānumatāṁś c āturvvaidya
-grāma-maryyādā-parihārān vitarāmaḥ . tad yathā| A-kara-d āyī
A-bhaṭa-cch
a ā tra-prāveśyaḥ A-pārampara-go-balīvarddaḥ A-puṣpa-
kṣ īra- sandohaḥ A-cārāsana-carmmāṁgāraḥ A-lavaṇa- kiṇva-kreṇ
ī i -
khanakaḥ sarvva-viṣṭi-parihāra-parihr̥taḥ sa-nidhih sopanidhih
sa- kl̥ptopak l̥pt
e a ḥ Ācandrāditya-kālīyaḥ putra-pautrānugāmī
bhuñjato na kenacid vyāghātaḥ karttavyaḥ sarvva-kriyābhiḥ
saṁrakṣitavya ḥ pariva rddhayitavyaś ca . yaś cāsmac-chāsanam agaṇa ya
mānaḥ svalpām api pa ribādhāṁ kuryyāt
kārayīta kārayeta vā | tasya brāh ma
ṇair āveditasya sa-daṇḍaṁ nigrahaṁ kuryyāma ḥ . Asmi ṁś ca dharmmāda ra-karaṇ e
At ītāneka-rāja-datt
ā a -sañc intana-paripālana ṁ kr̥ta-puṇyā
nukīrttana-pa rihārārtthaṁ na kīr ttayā maḥ . saṅkalpābhi dyo ga-parāk ramo
pajitān varttamānān ājñāpayāmaḥ eṣyata-kāla prabha viṣṇu-gauravā
d bhaviṣyān vi
jñāpayāmaḥ . vyāsa-g
i ī taś cātra ślokaḥ pra
māṇī-karttavyaḥ .

y v a-dattāṁ para-dattāṁ vā

saṁv vatsare
sapt
ā
a
daśe kārttika-śukla-pakṣ e dvādaśy āṁ se nāpatau ravidatte likhitaṁ
